strategy_reasoning: Using the 'Cozy Pixel Art' aesthetic aligns perfectly with the brand's 'soft, simple, welcoming' identity. A carousel allows us to showcase the variety of updates (Creative tools, Learning, Fixes) without overwhelming a single image. The retro game inventory metaphor makes the new apps feel like collectible items, increasing perceived value and nostalgia.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art title screen. A tiny 8-bit bee character hovering next to a sign that says 'FRESH DROPS'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Like Stardew Valley title screen. Wholesome and inviting.
images.description: Cover image introducing the updates with the brand mascot (bee).

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art game inventory UI. Three item slots displayed: 1) A pixelated retro camera with sparkles, 2) A mysterious purple crystal ball, 3) A tiny pixel globe. Soft pastel background, lime green (#ecf874) UI borders. Game UI style like Unpacking or Stardew Valley. Cozy and organized.
images.description: Showcasing the new Creative tools (Pimp my Pics, Lilith, World Gen) as game items.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a pixelated open book on a wooden desk. Magical lime green (#ecf874) sparkles rising from the pages. Represents 'EduGenius'. Soft warm lighting, window in background with pastel sunset sky. Chunky retro sprites. Nostalgic lo-fi study vibes.
images.description: Highlighting the EduGenius learning platform update.

images.prompt: Tiny 8-bit pixel art robot gardener fixing a wooden signpost. Soft lime green grass, pastel peach sky. Wholesome, cute, low-res aesthetic like A Short Hike. Represents fixing the README 404s. Peaceful vibes.
images.description: Visualizing the bug fix/documentation update in a friendly way.

alt_text: A carousel of cozy pixel art images featuring an 8-bit bee, a retro game inventory screen with new items, a magical pixelated book, and a cute robot gardener fixing a fence. The style is warm, nostalgic, and uses soft lime green and pastel colors.
